title: Prosecutors Seek Testimony on Trump Declassifying Documents
description: The Justice Department is seeking to compel Kash Patel, an ally of the former president, to answer questions about assertions that material taken from the White House had been declassified.
dc:creator: Adam Goldman, Charlie Savage and Michael S. Schmidt
media:credit: Rebecca Noble for The New York Times
media:description: Former President Donald J. Trump has claimed that he declassified national security documents he took from the White House.
